籤詩版本二:
Mgbe ogologo mmiri ozuzo malitere ikpochapụ, Jade Rabbit na Golden Crow na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-egbuke egbuke
Ihe ochie na-apụ n'anya, ihe ọhụrụ pụtara, lee anya, zute ọnụ ụzọ ámá dragọn ahụ.
詩意:
Hexagram a bụ akara nke ogologo mmiri ozuzo na ìhè mbụ.
Ihe niile na-aga dị ka atụmatụ.
解曰: Chi na Buddha chekwara. Ọ dịghị ihe ize ndụ nke ọdachi. Ka njem ahụ dịrị n'udo. Jiri nkwanye ugwu laghachi n'ikpeazụ.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Jiang Taigong zutere King Wen
Ọchịchị Zhou. Jiang Shang, aha ọma Ziya. Ji ndị mmadụ (si Xuzhou na East China Oké Osimiri). Aha ndị Taoist bụ Fei Xiong, e mekwara nna nna ya ihe akara na Lu (aha ebe), ya mere a na-akpọkwa ya Lu Wang.
Iji zere oge nsogbu nke Eze Zhou nke Shang Dynasty, o biri n'akụkụ mmiri nke Oké Osimiri East China ma na-akụ azụ na Osimiri Weishui. Nkọ azụ̀ kwụ ọtọ, ebumnobi ya abụghị ịkụ azụ, kama ịbụ praịm minista nwere omume ọma.
Eze Wen nke Zhou nuru na o nwere amamihe wee were ya goro dika onye nkuzi ya (onye isi ala). (Ọ dị afọ iri asatọ n'oge ahụ) Ka e mesịrị, Eze Wu nke Zhou wakporo Eze Zhou, bibie usoro ndị eze Shang, ma guzobe usoro eze Zhou. Eze Wu kporo ya Shangfu. Enyere nwa ya nwoke Ding Gong aha Marquis nke Qi.
(Ihe a na-elekwasị anya n'akụkọ a: Jiang Taigong, onye nọ na-echere ịkụ azụ na Osimiri Weishui ogologo oge, mechara pụọ ​​na nsogbu ma Eze Wen jiri ya mee ihe ọzọ.)
聖意: N'ime ụlọ, Zhongping n'onwe ya na-ekpe ekpere maka ngọzi na akụ na ụba, mgbe ọ nweghị nkwekọrịta, alụmdi na nwunye na-abụ ihe efu, ụmụ nwanyị Liujia na-agafe n'ọhịa, silkworm na-egbochi anụ ụlọ isii, gbochie ịchọ onye ahụ, gbuo oge ikpe, na ịkwaga. ihe na-efunahụ ọrịa, a na-ahụkwa ili Ji Xingshan dị mma.
